name: MuseoModerno
description: MuseoModerno is a contemporary geometric typeface for the new Identity of the Museum of Modern Art of Buenos Aires (Museo Moderno, AR). Designed by Marcela Romero, HÃ©ctor Gatti, Pablo Cosgaya and the Omnibus-Type Team. The June 2022 release completes the family with the italic.
